name: A light green toxin infused leather hood
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity monumentally.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It increases the users charisma impossibly much.
It has excellent armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration phenomenally.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users poison resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
